com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern.attribute
Class DeployAttributeValidator

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern.attribute.DeployAttributeValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDeployAttributeValidator
Direct Known Subclasses:
CapabilityAttributeToAttributePropagationValidator, CapabilityAttributeUniqueInGroupValidator, CapabilityAttributeUniqueInHostValidator, CapabilityAttributeUniqueInLinkValidator, CapabilityAttributeUniqueInTopologyValidator, DeployAttributeNotEqualsValidator, DeployAttributeNotNullValidator, DeployAttributeRestrictedValueValidator, DeployAttributeStringNotEmptyValidator, DeployAttributeValueValidator, DeployRequirementAttributeValidator
public abstract class DeployAttributeValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDeployAttributeValidator

Base abstract implementation of the IDeployAttributeValidator interface.

Provides methods for retrieving the value of the attribute, and reporting errors. Supports EAttribute on the DeployModelObject as well as DeployModelObject.getExtendedAttributes().

For validation of RequirementExpression.getAttributeName() use DeployRequirementAttributeValidator.

See Also:
UnitValidator.addAttributeValidator(IDeployAttributeValidator)

EAttribute#getName(), EAttribute#getEContainingClass()

DeployAttributeValidator

public DeployAttributeValidator(java.lang.String validatorID,
                                EClass attributeContainer,
                                java.lang.String attributeName)
Construct a new attribute validator for the specified containing class and attribute name.

Use for attribute validators on extended attributes (DeployModelObject.getEObject()).

Parameters:
validatorID - identifies the validator.
attributeContainer - the type of the attribute container (must be a subtype of DeployModelObject).
attributeName - the name of the EAttribute or ExtendedAttribute defined the instance of attributeContainer.
